Articles.Content:
Hello, I have recently created a craft to put a probe on Eve's surface, but when I stage my Mainsail and both Skippers, the Skippers produce no thrust. There is plenty of fuel for them, and the Mainsail works completely fine. any help?

Javascript is disabled. View full album

EDIT: I'm a complete idiot - how did I not notice the thrust limiter? On second thought, when did I limit their thrust in the first place?

Edited July 20, 2015 by Branjoman
It looks like you set the thrust limiter to 0?

It looks like you set the thrust limiter to 0?

Sorry to tell you this Branjoman but Yukon0009 is right, your throttle limiter limits the thrust from your engine, setting it to zero effectively prevents the engine from working.

Right click your Skippers in the VAB and slide the limiter back to 100, save your craft and launch, that will fix it.
